Social Security has nothing to do with the deficit, Bernie Sanders said. Cecile Frot-Coutaz says Idol isn't making the mistake of trying to replace Simon Cowell with a facsimile.`` You can't, and it would be foolish to try to do that,'' she says. If you go,` We're going to find another slightly nasty British( recording) executive,' people would reject that because that person would never live up to what Simon Cowell is. That's a recipe for disaster. In our very humble opinion, the only thing you can do is try to create a panel that's entertaining, likable and credible. scandal at one of Britain's sauciest tabloids. The aide, Andy Coulson , had edited News of the World, Britain's biggest-selling Sunday newspaper, until 2007 and soon after was hired by David Cameron . Unfortunately, continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in this role, Andy Coulson said. The resignation is a blow for David Cameron , who had repeatedly backed Andy Coulson against calls for his resignation, saying this week that everyone deserved a`` second chance.'' Kirsten Gillibrand chose the nominees from a large group of qualified applicants. Decisions were based on a criteria including academic record, leadership potential and overall achievement. Final acceptance is determined solely by the service academies. Our service academies are distinguished by a devotion to honor, courage and commitment. I am honored to nominate these young, talented New Yorkers who exemplify these core values. It is my hope that these accomplished nominees have the chance to live their dreams and serve in our country's armed forces with distinction, Kirsten Gillibrand said.
